BasicAttackHappyToBeOfService.name: Basic Attack: Happy to Be of Service

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes up to four attacks, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: After <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rock</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Scissors</ct>, press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Performs up to two attacks, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Launches a dashing attack at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Launches consecutive attacks against enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After using this skill, can immediately follow up with the 4th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Happy to Be of Service</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: With <ct color=#FFFFFF>Customer Complaint</ct>, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Delivers a forward martial salute attack. On activation, it consumes 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Customer Complaint</ct> and deals <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After activation, the previous character's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> is triggered.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Throws dual rings to slash enemies, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches a fist attack, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches a scissors attack, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches a paper attack, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Launches consecutive kicks against enemies in front, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After using this skill, can immediately follow up with the 4th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Happy to Be of Service</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

UltimateServiceStoppedForNumberDialed.name: Ultimate: Service Stopped for Number Dialed

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Rushes forward and performs a finger flick attack, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After using this skill, can immediately follow up with the 4th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Happy to Be of Service</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches consecutive attacks against enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After using this skill, can immediately follow up with the 4th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Happy to Be of Service</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</ct> when the character is under intense attacks.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Performs a rapid dash followed by a slash attack, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After using this skill, can immediately follow up with the 4th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Happy to Be of Service</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Upon entering the battlefield, Dialyn starts with 60 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct>. If her initial CRIT Rate surpasses 50%, her Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>1.4</ct> for each additional 1%, up to a maximum increase of 100.
desc.1: After using <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rock</ct>, the next <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> becomes <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Scissors</ct> for 8s.
desc.2: After using <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Scissors</ct>, the next <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> becomes <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Paper!</ct> for 8s.
desc.3: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Paper!</ct> hits an enemy, it applies the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Malicious Complaint</ct> effect. While under <ct color=#FFFFFF>Malicious Complaint</ct>, if the enemy becomes Stunned, the Stun duration is extended by 2s, and Stun DMG Multiplier increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct>. Before recovering from Stun, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Malicious Complaint</ct> can trigger on the same target only once. The Stun duration bonus does not stack with similar effects. When an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Malicious Complaint</ct> recovers from being Stunned, the effect ends.
desc.4: While in combat, Dialyn gains 0.6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct> per second. When a heavy attack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rock</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Scissors</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Paper!</ct> hits enemies, she gains 7.5 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct>. Each use of a skill can grant this bonus only once, up to a maximum of 120.
desc.5: With at least 90 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct>, when Dialyn triggers the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> window using <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Welcome Mat</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Get Lost!</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist: Forward Call</ct>, the next character to switch in will have their <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> upgraded to an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>. When an ally launches an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> this way, Dialyn consumes 60 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct>.
desc.6: With at least 90 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct>, when Dialyn hits an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Get Lost!</ct> and doesn't trigger a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> window, she consumes 90 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct> to forcibly trigger a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> window. The next character to switch in will have their <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> upgraded to an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>.
desc.7: Each time <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct> reaches 90 or an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> is activated, Dialyn obtains 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Customer Complaint</ct>. A maximum of 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Customer Complaint</ct> can be held at a time.

desc.0: Upon entering the battlefield, Dialyn starts with 60 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct>. If her initial CRIT Rate surpasses 50%, her Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>1.5</ct> for each additional 1%, up to a maximum increase of 100.

desc.0: Upon entering the battlefield, Dialyn starts with 60 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct>. If her initial CRIT Rate surpasses 50%, her Impact increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>2</ct> for each additional 1%, up to a maximum increase of 100.
desc.1: After using <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rock</ct>, the next <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> becomes <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Scissors</ct> for 8s.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</ct> character:
desc.1: Dialyn's <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> CRIT DMG is increased by 50%.
desc.2: When an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> is activated, all squad members gain the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Overwhelmingly Positive</ct> effect. While <ct color=#FFFFFF>Overwhelmingly Positive</ct> is active, DMG dealt is increased by 40% for 15s. When Dialyn uses an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> while <ct color=#FFFFFF>Overwhelmingly Positive</ct> is active, if the remaining duration of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Overwhelmingly Positive</ct> is less than 35s, its duration is extended by 10s.
desc.3: When a heavy attack from <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rock</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Scissors</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Paper!</ct> hits, additional DMG is dealt based on the previous squad member's Specialty:
desc.4: If the squad member is an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Attack</ct> Agent, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rock</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Scissors</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Paper!</ct> deal additional DMG equal to 320% of that <ct color=#FFFFFF>Attack</ct> Agent's ATK.
desc.5: If the squad member is a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</ct> Agent, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rock</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Scissors</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Paper!</ct> deal additional DMG equal to 400% of that <ct color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</ct> Agent's Sheer Force.

1.name: Boundless Hospitality
1.desc: The amount of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Positive Reviews</ct> accumulated each second and gained when <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Rock</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Scissors</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Paper!</ct> hits an enemy increase by 16%. While the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Overwhelmingly Positive</ct> effect is active, characters ignore 15% of enemy All-Attribute RES.

flavor.0: Welcome to the Cross-Department Customer Service Center!
flavor.1: Our motto is simple: always wear a smile, always greet every customer with passion~!
flavor.2: A smile... the one expression I once found hardest to fake. When did it become second nature to me?
flavor.3: "Hello there, darling~ How can I help you? Well~ not that I really can do anything for you!"

2.name: 24/7 Hotline
2.desc: Enemies affected by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Malicious Complaint</ct> gain an additional 20% Stun DMG Multiplier when Stunned, and all units deal 15% increased DMG to targets affected by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Malicious Complaint</ct>.

flavor.0: TOPS is the biggest corporate alliance in New Eridu, and our work keeps this city alive~!
flavor.1: We're the essential lubricant that keeps this great machine turning, so our service hotline must stay open 24/7, no matter what!
flavor.2: Endless noise and constant chatter? No problem — that's what I know best.
flavor.3: "Please feel free to contact me anytime~! No matter when you do, I'll still be just as annoying~!"

3.name: Call From the Hollow
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: The Hollows are a vast tomb, where every echo of life falls silent within its pitch-black coffin.
flavor.1: But to me, it's a call I can never refuse, the final page of every diary, a memo of obsession and lingering resentment.
flavor.2: Even if... all that talk of letting go or holding on, they've got nothing to do with my own story.
flavor.3: "It's alright! I've talked with plenty of clients far harder to communicate with than you~!"

4.name: The Past Never Fades
4.desc: Upon entering combat, Dialyn recovers 20 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 180s in Investigation Zone Mode. While the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Overwhelmingly Positive</ct> effect is active, Dialyn's ATK increases by 500.

flavor.0: People always treat me like a kid because I'm small, but my childhood is long since over.
flavor.1: Which day did it end, though? The first time I heard the whispers of the dead? When I was sent into the Hollow as a sacrifice? Or that first night I cried myself to sleep?
flavor.2: With no one to protect me, I had to find my own footing. Unable to forget the past, I pretended to let it go.
flavor.3: "I don't care about your personal issues~ but I am very concerned about how your childhood trauma might affect my complaint rate~!"

5.name: Lies
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: We lie when others still care about us, and only tell the truth once they've stopped.
flavor.1: Such foolish choices always lead to regret. My job is simply to use yesterday's regrets to make today's a little lighter.
flavor.2: I know people always lie, but at least there are still some who bother to lie to me.
flavor.3: "My suggestion? Mix a bit of flattering nonsense in between your insults — it'll work in your favor~!"

6.name: Truth
6.desc: When an ally enters the field with an Ultimate through the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive</ct>'s effect, that ally gains the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Aftertone</ct> effect. With this effect, landing an attack causes Dialyn to deal an additional instance of <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> equal to 480% of Dialyn's ATK. This DMG is treated as <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> DMG, and can trigger once every second, up to 12 times. Gaining <ct color=#FFFFFF>Aftertone</ct> again refreshes its trigger count. Only one ally can have <ct color=#FFFFFF>Aftertone</ct> at a time.

flavor.0: A sudden death is like a moment preserved in time, capturing truth in its final, immutable form.
flavor.1: I take these specimens from the hands of the dead, using their death certificates as the foundation for my judgments.
flavor.2: Pure, objective "truth" is the only rule I can depend on, the only thread guiding my way forward... until—
